title: Signify to introduce new products and innovations at CIIE - SHINE News
summary: Signify is returning to the China International Import Expo with a commitment to invest in China for high-tech and low-carbon solutions. They signed a cooperation agreement for innovative plant lighting solutions, aiming to establish world-leading agricultural production facilities with low-carbon technology.
business_innovation: TRUE - The article discusses Signify's commitment to invest in China for high-tech and low-carbon solutions, which can be considered a business innovation as it involves new or improved products or processes.
green_product: TRUE - The article mentions Signify's sustainable lighting products that use circular manufacturing technologies, recycled materials, and energy-efficient processes, aligning with the definition of a green product.
green_process: TRUE - The article talks about Signify's implementation of innovative plant lighting solutions with low-carbon and energy-saving technology, which promotes sustainability and minimizes environmental impacts.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 335121 - Residential Electric Lighting Fixture Manufacturing, 335129 - Other Lighting Equipment Manufacturing, 335122 - Nonresidential Electric Lighting Fixture Manufacturing, 562998 - All Other Miscellaneous Waste Management Services
